headline: Get Hopping to Kroger for Easter Meal Essentials Under $6 per person
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced it is making Easter more affordable with a holiday meal that includes all the staples for less than $6 per person. Complete with ham, sides and dessert families can enjoy the day without skipping their seasonal favorites.

raw.headline: Get Hopping to Kroger for Easter Meal Essentials Under $6 per person

headline: Kroger plans to build 3 new stores in Ohio and Kentucky
summary: The grocer also intends to renovate 16 locations in connection with $130 million it allocated for capital investments in its Cincinnati/Dayton division this year.
